programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: The Portable Door, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: The Living Daylights, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond (Timothy Dalton) takes a Czech cellist (Maryam d'Abo) to her boyfriend, a KGB defector (Jeroen Krabb) doing business in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Dr. No, (1962, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: Octopussy, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) links a fake Faberge egg to smugglers (Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan) in league with a mad Soviet general.

programme.title: From Russia With Love, (1963, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 arrives in Istanbul, bringing with him a Russian beauty who is an unwitting pawn in SPECTRE's plot to kill him.

programme.title: Live and Let Die, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) charms a tarot reader (Jane Seymour) in Jamaica on the voodoo/heroin trail of Mr. Big (Yaphet Kotto).

programme.title: GoldenEye, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A secret weapon's theft sends Agent 007 to Russia, where a pretty computer programmer helps him track an ex-cohort believed dead.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After receiving a license to kill, British agent James Bond (Daniel Craig) enters a high-stakes poker game with Le Chiffre (Mads Mikkelsen), a man who finances terrorist groups.

programme.title: Die Another Day, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: James Bond (Pierce Brosnan) teams with a beautiful agent (Halle Berry) to battle a terrorist and a businessman (Toby Stephens) bent on world domination.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: LaRoy, Texas, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mistaken for a low-rent hit man, Ray decides to play the part of a hired gun. However, when the supposedly simple plan begins to unravel, he recruits a private investigator to help him escape from the actual killer and make it out alive.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London, (2004, Children)
programme.desc: A 16-year-old CIA agent (Frankie Muniz) poses as a clarinet prodigy while trying to recover stolen mind-control software.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging irresponsible misfit (Paul Newman) falls in love with an unhappily married younger woman (Melanie Griffith).

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV host's (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Daredevil operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) springs into action when four dangerous criminals steal Pandora's Box, a device that controls every military satellite in the world.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After receiving a license to kill, British agent James Bond (Daniel Craig) enters a high-stakes poker game with Le Chiffre (Mads Mikkelsen), a man who finances terrorist groups.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra, they are also forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: The Parallax View, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A reporter's investigation into a political assassination reveals a nationwide network of trained killers.

programme.title: Suspect Zero, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: With help from his former partner (Carrie-Anne Moss), an FBI agent (Aaron Eckhart) searches for a man (Ben Kingsley) who is hunting and murdering serial killers.

programme.title: Intersection, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An architect (Richard Gere) on the brink of a car accident recalls troubles with his wife (Sharon Stone) and his mistress (Lolita Davidovich) in Vancouver, British Columbia.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A '50s-era housewife (Julianne Moore) uses her wit and winnings from commercial jingle contests to help support her large family.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Deep House, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: While diving in a remote French lake, two YouTubers who specialize in underwater exploration videos discover a house submerged in deep waters. Their dive turns into a nightmare when they discover the house was the scene of atrocious crimes.

programme.title: The Passenger, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Mimic, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: Married scientists (Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam) battle killer cockroaches that develop the ability to assume human form.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancee's.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy, on the move again, ends up in Chihuahua, Mexico, with a new Mexican friend called Segura; together they enjoy several risky escapades -- but in the end, Billy risks losing his life.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy bumps into a new character called Pat Garrett, who is riding with Jesse and the 7 Rivers Gang; Billy joins them - but law makers are already closing in; they plan to flee to Lincoln County - but not before Billy fulfils one last promise.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Rings, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman (Matilda Lutz) makes a horrifying discovery after her boyfriend (Alex Roe) investigates a story about a mysterious video that kills people seven days after they watch it.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter (Tom Selleck) goes to Australia, where his new boss (Alan Rickman) expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: A man with no name (Clint Eastwood) and a man with a mission (Lee Van Cleef) hunt a Mexican bandit (Gian Maria Volonte) for different reasons.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: A former Marine (Thomas Ian Griffith) returns to Vietnam to rescue a comrade (Chris Mulkey) and retrieve nuclear triggers.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Unhuman, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Seven misfit students must band together against a growing gang of unhuman savages. Their trust in each other gets tested to the limit in a brutal, horrifying fight to survive as they take down the murderous zombie creatures.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Undercover Brother, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: A low-rent private detective poses as a preppy nerd in order to foil a plot by conspirators.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hip detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.

programme.title: 48 HRS., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: An old gunfighter (John Wayne), a drifter (James Caan) and a deputy sober up a sheriff (Robert Mitchum) to track down killers.

programme.title: Three Wishes, (1995, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A frustrated family man recalls an encounter he (Joseph Mazzello), his widowed mom (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) and his family had with a mysterious vagrant (Patrick Swayze) in 1955 suburbia.

programme.title: How It Ends, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: A woman scores an invite to one last wild party before the world ends. However, making it there won't be easy after her car is stolen and the clock is ticking on her plan to tie up loose ends with friends and family.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Three private detectives try to rescue a kidnapped computer pro whose voice-ID software would threaten global security.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Three private detectives (Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu) work under cover to retrieve two rings that contain cryptic information.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A pampered actor and his co-stars must become actual soldiers when the war movie they are filming in Southeast Asia turns into the real thing.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy City's police force.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: Training Day, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie police officer meets a corrupt Los Angeles narcotics detective who wants to include him in his schemes.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri, (1954, War)
programme.desc: Recalled to duty, a lawyer (William Holden) leaves his wife (Grace Kelly) and goes to Korea to bomb bridges for an admiral (Fredric March).

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar (Cary Grant) sees fireworks with an American heiress (Grace Kelly) on the Riviera.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A corporate dictator (John Houseman) tries to oust the star player (James Caan) of a brutal 21st-century spectator sport.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-cop doing prison time chases a virtual-reality killer from the program onto the Los Angeles streets.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (2016, Western)
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Training Day, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie police officer meets a corrupt Los Angeles narcotics detective who wants to include him in his schemes.

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)

programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: E mais uma vez o Imprio Crisis coloca a pequena ilha de Shikoku como alvo principal. Crianas com poderes psquicos esto sendo raptadas uma aps a outra por um misterioso homem velho. O que Crisis planeja com essas crianas? Qual o destino de Shikoku?
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Crisis iniciou uma operao que consiste na invaso de sistemas, e agora o sistema da polcia est em suas mos. Pessoas inocentes esto sendo presas uma aps a outra e Issamu tambm uma delas.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Surge um misterioso mascarado em cena, seu nome Grande Mscara. Ele comea a derrotar campees de diversas modalidades, um aps o outro, tornando-se facilmente o novo dolo das crianas.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: No pacfico Vilarejo Fujimura, uma espcie de OVNI aparece e comea a atacar os moradores.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Uma misteriosa luz envolve a famlia Yamaji . Qual ser o maior perigo de todos que o pote de herana prev? E qual ser o segredo da inscrio?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 34 - A Caveira Assassina Monstro Feiticeiro Gomaz Famlia Yamashi e Rei Yagy(Kinin Reiha)

programme.title: Surge o Deus Jirai, que se manifestou para defender Toha da famlia de Feitceiros que invocou o monstro gigante Yonma. Deus Jirai seria a entidade protetora de Jiraiya? Algo extraordinrio est para acontecer! Lute Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 35 - O Desafio dos Togakure Monstro Feiticeiro Gomaz, Commando e Killer Tha(Jiraiya) e Deus Jirai

programme.title: Em um canto obscuro da cidade grande uma sombra negra move-se sorrateiramente. Jiraiya investiga incidentes que ocorreram segundo as previses de um mdium suspeito. Ser que este mdium tem alguma previso para nosso ninja?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 36 - O Feitio do Gato Preto Yaminin Devilcat Tha(Jiraiya), Kei(Himenin Emiha), Manabu e Henri Rakuchin

programme.title: Jiraya procura respostas sobre o paradeiro do tesouro do sculo atravs das escrituras do Deus Jirai. Porm, Dokosai tambm est atrs do tesouro e Jiraya far de tudo para proteg-lo. Go Jiraya!
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 37 - O Homem de 2300 Anos Uchnin Del-Star (Uchnin Demost) Tha(Jiraiya), Rei Yagy(Kinin Reiha) e Jnin Baro Owl

programme.title: A famlia de Feiticeiros mais uma vez tentar exterminar Jiraya e resgatado por seus amigos. Morgana retorna e se rene com Dokosai para encontrar Pako e destruir o Deus Jirai.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 38 - As Mil e Uma Faces Oninin Dokusai e Aracnin Morgana (Ynin Kumo Gozen = "Ninja Feiticeira Madame Aranha") Tha(Jiraiya) e Tetsuzan

programme.title: A academia de Jiraya no vai muito bem e surge uma nova academia de ninjas. A diretora da escola Morgana e aprisiona todas as crianas reprovadas para entrar na escola. O que ser que ela est tramando? Jiraya conseguir salvar as crianas?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 39 - A Conspirao de Morgana Aracnin Morgana e os Mini-Karasutengus Kei(Himenin Emiha) e Manabu

programme.title: Uma desconhecida ninja do imprio procura Tetsuzan Yamashi e encontrar sua localizao de Pako. Jiraya ento ajuda a nisei a encontrar o local nas minas.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 40 - A Traio Tetsunin Steel 002 Tha(Jiraiya), Kazenin Storm, Rainin Wild e Hnin Jane

programme.title: Uchnin Dell-Star tem um sonho e percebe que nunca combater Jiraya sem sua antiga espada, Sat, porque ela a nica que pode derrotar a espada Olmpica. O caador de espadas tambm est a sua procura. O que acontecer?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 41 - Olmpica VS Sat Uchnin Del-Star e Igynin Beni Lagarto(controlado pela magia da Espada Sat) Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.title: O pai de Hakyo continua agindo de forma estranha... O plano de Gadorian para alimentar a Comunidade Camila, transformando-os em comida para monstros, que envolve o Monstro Kaima Lickpack, ativa a ira de Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Maribaron volta para Crisis e recebe ordens expressas do Imperador Crisis. Bosgan recebe ordens especficas para capturar noivas cujo signo de Escorpio. Bosgan chama o Guerreiro Kaima Gainakamakil e ambos vo ao encontro de Issamu para confront-lo.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.desc: Quando Emperor Crimson disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot perfurado pela flecha. Quem est dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.

programme.title: South Park est em festa! o "Dia das Vacas", e os cidados podem passear pela feira, conferir um monumento e a grande corrida das vacas. Enquanto isso, os rapazes fazem de tudo para ganhar uns bonecos de Terrance e Philip.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Chef est sendo processado por tentar obter os direitos autorais de uma cano que escreveu h 20 anos atrs. Para ajud-lo nesta batalha, os garotos organizam um concerto para arrecadar dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A tia Flo est de visita e d um presente para Stan: um peixe medonho. Com o tempo, comeam a aparecer alguns cadveres por a, e a me de Stan tenta fingir que no tem nada a ver.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan foge de casa e vai Nebraska. Os rapazes querem ver o senhor Hanckey na noite de Natal. E o tio de Cartman e Charles Manson escapam da priso e se escondem no poro dos Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes so obrigados a escreverem textos sobre pequenas empresas para que o senhor Garrison no perca o seu trabalho como professor. Os meninos se juntam com Tweek, que sugere um novo tema para a redao: "Gnomos que roubam cuecas".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e kyle descobrem um homem que estava preso no gelo h mais de trs anos, mas acabam brigando para ver quem o descobriu e qusl nome dar para ele.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Vrios habitantes de South Park esto ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razo aparente. Randy o principal responsvel para descobrir uma soluo para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereo".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chef tem uma namorada nova e ao que parece, uma relao sria. Agora os rapazes esto preocupados com isso. Enquanto isso, Cartman est com problemas nos olhos e odeia ter que ir ao seu oculista, que o chama de "porquinho".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Kyle e Stan enganam Tweek e Craig para que eles lutem um contra o outro. Enquanto isso, um dos professores est sendo atormentado por uma recordao de sua falecida namorada, e Kenny conquista um homem rico na aula de cozinha.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman descobre uma criatura em extino durante um acampamento. No incio, todos acham legal, mas em seguida, todos se do conta que na verdade esta criatura, na verdade, um animal pr-histrico extremamente chato.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A aula do senhor Garrison recebe uma visita: Petey, o panda do abuso sexual, que ensina tudo aos rapazes sobre o tema. Em seguida, Cartman decide processar Stan por cham-lo de "chupa cu", e contrata o pai do Kyle para ser seu advogado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A senhora Cartman vai para uma festa e deixa o seu filho sob os cuidados de Shelley. Agora, Cartman est preso em sua casa e precisa lidar com os abusos de Shelley, seu namorado de 22 anos e sua gata que est no cio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colgio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situao um tanto quanto incmoda em uma jacuzzi.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: Na noite de chuva de meteoritos, Kyle, Kenny e Ike vo ao acampamento de exploradores judios, onde se encontram com Moiss, o cara que ama oferendas feitas de coisas estranhas com materiais esquisitos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes esto viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma pardia de Pokmon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um garoto encontra uma nave espacial e a usa para escapar de um ritual crito na Etipia, e buscar um novo lugar para ele e seu povo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle, Stan, Kenny e Cartman querem aproveitar a noite de Halloween para assustar os rapazes do quinto ano, ento desenterram o cadver da av de Kyle. Enquanto isso, a banda Korn visita South Park.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: O mistrio irado do fantasma pirata da banda

programme.title: A me de Cartman d um presente para ajud-lo a ganhar o concurso de soletrar. Trata-se de um "macaco da fontica". Neste concurso, os rapazes conhecem Marc e Rebecca, dois irmos que no vo para a escola, pois estudam em suas casas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Durante uma recreao sobre a guerra civil americana, Cartman lidera o exrcito dos Confederados para atacar os guerreiros da Unio do outro lado da Amrica. Tudo isso para poder ganhar uma aposta de Kyle e Stan.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Hanckey apresenta dez musicais baseados em canes clssicas de Natal, cantadas por Kyle, Cartman, Stan, Kenny e todos os demais habitantes de South Park em seu prprio especial de Natal. Inclui os hits "Noite Feliz" e muito mais!
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Os clssicos de Natal do Senhor Hankey

programme.title: Cartman e Kenny acham que esto menstruando, mas na realidade, esto com uma infeco. Agora, Kyle e Stan tambm querem menstruar. Enquanto isso, se aproxima o novo milnio e os habitantes exigem que Jesus apresente Deus para eles.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Voc est a, Deus? Sou eu, Jesus

programme.title: Os rapazes viajam para Arkansas para participar de um concerto de flauta doce e Cartman tenta tocar "rudo marrom", uma nota que faz com que as pessoas caguem nas calas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Ento eles resolvem roubar dentes, j que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes ficam entusiasmados com um circo e seus contorsionistas sensacionais e acabam tendo a ideia de criar seu prprio circo. Enquanto isso, cinco meninas escapam do tal circo e Kenny est fazendo aulas de pera.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Todos os alunos de South Park so diagnosticados com TDAH (Dficit de Ateno e Hiperatividade) depois que o novo aluno, Timmy, foi diagnosticado erroneamente com a mesma coisa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Conto Southparkineiro de um livro de Dickens, tendo como narrador o britnico Malcolm McDowell, e como protagonista, Pip, um menino ingls pobre, que sonha em se transformar em um cavalheiro para conquistar a garota dos seus sonhos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vrios problemas com pedfilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associao De Ssias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: Kyle est doente e sua me est tentando curar ele atravs da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas romnticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chef est furioso pois acha que a bandeira de South Park racista e quer que a mudem. Mas por outro lado, Jimbo (apoiado pelos KKK), acha que faz parte da histria e que no deveriam mudar coisa alguma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman tem um sonho estranho em que ele, Kyle, Stan e Kenny ficam famosos em uma banda de pop juvenil chamada "Fingerbang", e entende isso como um sinal de Deus.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Uma coisa que voc pode fazer com o seu dedo

programme.title: Os rapazes querem saber se os deficientes (como Timmy) ou os judeus (como Kyle e Ike) vo para o cu, aps escutar o sermo do Padre Maxi e da irm Anne. Enquanto isso, Sadam Hussein volta ao inferno e tem um encontro esquisito com Satn.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Os deficientes vo para o inferno?

programme.title: Esta a continuao do episdio anterior "Os deficientes vo para o inferno?". Cartman e os rapazes criam a sua prpria igreja ao ver que a verdadeira igreja no pode ajud-los.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: o primeiro dia dos rapazes no quarto ano e eles no gostaram nada de sua nova professora. Ento, eles pedem ajuda aos vizinhos de Kyle para transformar a cadeira de rodas de Timmy em uma mquina do tempo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman ensina aos rapazes sueu novo fichrio ultra moderno da Trapper Keeper, e melhor que o de Kyle. Mais tarde, no nibus, um homem supostamente chamado Bill Cosby mostra um enorme interesse pelo tal fichrio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os alunos do quarto ano esto participando da pea "Hellen Keller, a milagrosa". O nico objetivo deles conseguir ir um pouco melhor que os alunos do jardim de infncia, que segundo Butters, preparam um show espetacular.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman est muito gordo e decidem envi-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny est topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva s mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O 3 Andar - Terror na Rua Malasaa, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, uma famlia se muda para Madri em busca do sonho da cidade grande. Na nova casa, eles descobrem que no esto sozinhos.

programme.title: Epa! Cad o No?, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Dave e seu filho Finny se disfaram e conseguem entrar na Arca de No. Porm Finny e sua amiga, Leah, acidentalmente caem na gua. Agora, os dois precisam sobreviver a predadores e a inundao e tentar chegar ao topo de uma montanha.

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: O co vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da famlia Davis, que est enfrentando tempos difceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criana, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho.

programme.title: Trs Ladres e um Beb, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: O compulsivo jogador Slipper v o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvao de suas dvidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que tambm est atrs da criana.

programme.title: Trumbo - Lista Negra, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Autor de algumas das histrias de maior sucesso da poca, Dalton Trumbo foi preso e proibido de trabalhar. Mesmo quando saiu da priso, demorou anos para vencer o boicote do governo, sofrendo com problemas envolvendo familiares e amigos prximos.

programme.title: Um Amor Altura, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um homem encontra o celular de Diane e entra em contato para devolv-lo. Quando se encontram, ela tem uma surpresa: ele tem apenas 1,36 m. Os dois logo se apaixonam, mas ela no est pronta para lidar com o preconceito de namorar um homem to baixo.

programme.title: Meu Trabalho um Parto, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Desesperada, Thea finge estar grvida para no perder o emprego. O nico problema que a gravidez uma mentira e agora ela precisa fazer de tudo para convencer a todos de que realmente est esperando um beb.

programme.title: Perseguio Radical, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Depois de perder sua esposa e ainda ser preso, um homem descobre que seu filho foi recrutado por uma importante e perigosa organizao criminosa. Agora ele deve arriscar tudo para salv-lo.

programme.title: 72 Horas Depois, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Depois de se envolver com um perigoso sindicato do crime, um policial disfarado acorda e descobre que perdeu seu parceiro, sua esposa e os ltimos trs dias de sua vida.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (1970, Adventure)
programme.desc: Mecnico chins vai para o Japo para encontrar o seu grande amor, mas descobre que ela se casou com um lder mafioso. Ele vira um assassino profissional e logo vai ganhando poder entre os criminosos, tornando-se o lder de uma gangue de imigrantes.

programme.title: Crocus conta a Luffy e o bando a histria de Laboon, a baleia beira da Red Line!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Amor em Ritmo de Dana, (2009, Drama)

programme.desc: Rodrigo tenta acalmar Alejandra aps o confronto que teve com Leonardo; Alejandra quer ver o fim do relacionamento de Irene e pede que Rodrigo se junte a ela.

programme.title: Amor secreto, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O filho de Leonardo diz que Irene sempre ser uma simples funcionria para ele.

programme.desc: Irene sente muito amor por Leonardo e quer ter certeza de que ele a ama antes de se casarem.

programme.title: Deixados Para Trs, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Num voo rumo a Londres, o jornalista Buck e o piloto Rayford testemunham algo incrvel: dzias de passageiros desaparecem. Logo sabe-se que milhes de pessoas desapareceram no mundo, inclusive a famlia de Rayford. Os dois vo atrs de respostas.

programme.title: Deixados para Trs II - Comando Tribulao, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Aps o desaparecimento de milhes de pessoas, o mundo, em desespero, recorre ao presidente das Naes Unidas. Mas um grupo distante dali, chamado Comando Tribulao, tenta alertar a todos sobre a verdadeira e sinistra identidade do governante.

programme.title: Cdigo da Mfia, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Mike acaba de sair da priso e aceita fazer um ltimo servio com seu irmo para poder se livrar do mundo do crime e cuidar de sua filha. Ele logo descobrir que a justia das ruas muito pior que tudo o que passou na priso.

programme.title: Terror no Ar, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um para-brisas de uma aeronave comercial se estilhaa a 30.000 ps de altitude e um piloto e sua tripulao fazem de tudo para garantir a segurana dos passageiros e pousar o avio.

programme.title: O Grande Tsunami, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um tsunami avassalador chega causando destruio, levando um grupo de sobreviventes a lutar pelas suas vidas em meio ao caos. Enquanto esperam pelo resgate, eles descobrem que um crocodilo gigante os espreita sob as guas.

programme.title: Obsesso, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Aps a morte de seu pai, Catherine viaja de volta para sua antiga propriedade familiar na Noruega. Quando os habitantes locais comeam a contar histrias de desaparecimentos e possveis assassinatos, ela forada a enfrentar o passado.

programme.title: Lukas, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Para no perder a custdia de sua filha de oito anos, um segurana de boate obrigado a colaborar com a polcia. Ele precisa se infiltrar em uma organizao holandesa especializada em falsificar dinheiro.

programme.title: Assassinos Annimos, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A tenso est insuportvel dentro da Assassinos Annimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos esto tentando descobrir qual deles est por trs de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.title: Minsculos - O Filme, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio aos restos de um piquenique, uma joaninha ajuda formigas negras em uma divertida batalha por acar contra formigas vermelhas.

programme.title: De Volta ao Fundo do Mar, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O pequeno peixe Kevin apanhado em uma rede e levado para um tanque em um restaurante de Nova York. Agora, ele deve encontrar uma maneira de voltar para casa e reencontrar sua famlia.

programme.title: Agente Mirim, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Quando sua me viaja, Olvia fica sob os cuidados do seu irmo mais velho, Miles. Quando Olivia testemunha um sequestro, ningum acredita nela, nem mesmo seu irmo. Determinada a provar seu valor, a pequena decide investigar o crime por si s.

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Big Stone Gap o lar de personagens charmosos e excntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacutica de 35 anos, a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabea para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de famlia.

programme.title: Uma Viagem para a Espanha, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Steve Coogan e Rob Brydon conhecem restaurantes e hotis da costa espanhola, trocando piadas e impresses sobre seus almoos, conversando sobre paternidade, masculinidade e envelhecimento.

programme.title: Nosso Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em um ntimo retrato do casamento, um casal que divide a vida h muitos anos precisa lidar com uma grave doena. Enquanto vivem o medo da perda, eles usam o humor e a parceria para manter a esperana.

programme.title: Espera da Chuva, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps a morte misteriosa de seu pai, uma jornalista volta sua cidade natal no interior. Ao chegar, descobre que o local est devastado pela seca e se tornou um lugar atormentado por gangues e os maus efeitos da pobreza extrema.

programme.title: Deixados Para Trs, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Num voo rumo a Londres, o jornalista Buck e o piloto Rayford testemunham algo incrvel: dzias de passageiros desaparecem. Logo sabe-se que milhes de pessoas desapareceram no mundo, inclusive a famlia de Rayford. Os dois vo atrs de respostas.

programme.title: Um Homem Chamado Ove, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um velho aposentado, vivo e mal-humorado leva uma vida amargurada. Mas justo quando ele desiste de viver, novos vizinhos mudam para a casa da frente e surge uma amizade inesperada.

programme.title: Se Yugi for eliminado do torneio, a junta de diretores corrupta da KaibaCorp transferir o controle da companhia de Kaiba para Pegasus!

programme.title: Yugi deve duelar contra o fantasma de Kaiba, criado pela ganncia e cobia pelo poder que Yugi extirpou da alma de Kaiba. Sem suas melhores cartas, Yugi precisa de uma nova estratgia para sobreviver ao Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do Kaiba impostor.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi derrota o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis, mas h mais dois esperando nas asas! Ser que o Kaiba verdadeiro alcanar Yugi a tempo de ajud-lo a derrotar esse impostor?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey decide batalhar contra Rex Raptor sem a ajuda de seus amigos para provar que homem bastante para cuidar de Serenity sozinho.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey duela com bravura, mas Rex Raptor liberou sua arma secreta: o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Joey precisa descobrir o segredo do presente de Yugi, a carta Mago do Tempo, sem a ajuda de Yugi, ou partir do Reino dos Duelistas no prximo navio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura, um colega de turma de Yugi, possudo pelos poderes escuros de seu Anel do Milnio, prende Yugi e seus amigos em um Jogo das Sombras no qual eles se tornam as prprias cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: PaniK, o duelista de Pegasus, trapaceia e ganha todas as estrelas de Mai. Yugi jura derrot-lo e recuper-las. Porm, o Castelo de Iluses Escuras de PaniK envolve seus monstros numa nvoa escura. Como Yugi derrotar um inimigo que ele no pode ver?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: A Luz no Fim do Tnel

programme.title: Apesar de sua surpreendente desvantagem, Yugi provoca PaniK destemidamente: Vou acabar com voc em trs turnos. Yugi est blefando ou tem a vantagem nesta batalha de inteligncia?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba desce at o reino para enfrentar Pegasus! Ser que Kaiba mudou aps sua batalha com Yugi ou ainda o mesmo duelista impiedoso? A resposta jaz numa batalha entre o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis de Kaiba e o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A gangue do duelista americano n 1, Bandit Keith, sequestra Joey para uma caverna secreta com um cemitrio como campo de jogo. Enquanto Yugi e seus amigos procuram por ele, Joey enfrenta monstros zumbis que ficam mais forte ao sarem de seus tmulos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A ltima tentativa de Joey, sua carta da sorte Mago do Tempo, fracassa contra os monstros zumbis de Bandit Keith. Ao passo que sua mar de sorte acaba, ser que suas habilidades melhoradas e amor por sua irm o inspiraro para a vitria?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Presos na caverna labirinto, Yugi e seus amigos encontram uma sada alternativa, mas a porta vigiada pelos Irmos Paradoxo, irmos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey combinam foras e se defendem dos monstros de seus oponentes, mas as coisas logo mudaro, j que os Irmos Paradoxo invocam o todo-poderoso Guardio do Porto, um monstro que reflete qualquer ataque!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey liberam cada um o seu monstro mais forte, Caveira Invocada e Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, mas a fora deles perde a imponncia, comparada ao tremendo poder do Guardio do Porto.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Usando a mgica do Olho do Milnio, Pegasus prende a alma de Mokuba dentro de uma carta bem na frente de Kaiba! Para conseguir o direito de desafiar Pegasus, Kaiba precisa derrotar Yugi e pegar suas estrelas primeiro.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba invoca Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, o monstro mais forte do jogo, a fuso de trs Drages Brancos de Olhos Azuis! Yugi perdeu seus poderosos Monstros de Duelo, mas um duelista verdadeiro nunca desiste!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi comea a tecer uma estratgia para destruir o Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, mas tem que decidir se vai clamar vitria ou poupar a vida de Kaiba. O corao de Yugi est dividido.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Tendo perdido suas estrelas para Kaiba, assim como sua nica chance de salvar seu av, Yugi est em estado de choque. Ser que Ta pode fazer Yugi recobrar os sentidos ganhando as estrelas de Mai, ensinando o corao do duelista a Yugi?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos entram no castelo e veem que Kaiba est pronto para duelar contra Pegasus, e a alma de Mokuba continua com um futuro incerto! O poder do Olho do Milnio d a Pegasus a habilidade de ler a mente das pessoas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba impotente diante do deck Mundo Toon de Pegasus e de sua habilidade de ler mentes. Quando o duelo acaba, Pegasus prende a alma de Kaiba em uma carta, como com o av de Yugi e Mokuba! Yugi est farto!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: a noite da vspera da batalha final, e muitas criaturas esto agitadas! Yugi jura derrotar Pegasus pelo bem de seu av. Tristan lidera uma equipe de reconhecimento para descobrir os segredos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Diante do olhar sufocante de Pegasus, Yugi se distrai do duelo com Mai. Aps cometer erros de ttica bobos e deixar Mai obter uma vantagem enorme com seu Drago de Estimao da Harpia, ser que Yugi recuperar o foco ou sucumbir presso intensa?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Mai se recuperou de sua derrota anterior para Joey, tornando-se uma duelista melhor. Ser que Yugi aprendeu com sua derrota para Kaiba, ou o sentimento de derrota ainda pesa em seu corao? A resposta est nas cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey procura desesperadamente a carta que permitir que ele entre na batalha final, sem perceber que Bandit Keith a roubou. Enquanto ele reluta em aceitar que Serenity ficar cega para sempre, ele recebe ajuda de um novo amigo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Aps o deck Mquina de Bandit Keith forar Joey a jogar na defensiva, Joey copia a estratgia de Keith e metaliza seu Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Sua vitria certa, ou o trapaceiro Bandit Keith tem literalmente uma ltima carta debaixo da manga?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Com seu orgulho por sua fora como duelista em jogo, Joey desafia Yugi pelo direito de enfrentar Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi fica chocado quando Joey usa a carta Mago do Tempo contra ele, justamente a carta que ele deu a Joey como sinal de amizade!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi se prepara para a batalha suprema contra Pegasus, com as almas de seu av, Kaiba e Mokuba em jogo. No meio-tempo, Tristan e Bakura se infiltram no castelo para encontrar os irmos Kaiba, mas ser que Bakura est voltando ao seu eu maligno de novo?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 1

programme.title: Pegasus tambm pune Yugi com seu deck Toon e habilidade de ler mentes. Ao passo que Pegasus faz os monstros de Yugi se virarem contra ele, Yugi perde a determinao de batalhar. Ser que Pegasus prender a alma de Yugi em uma carta, assim como com Kaiba?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 2

programme.title: Yugi descobriu como escapar da habilidade de Pegasus de ler mentes: Yugi alterna entre suas duas almas! Yugi consegue destruir o Mundo Toon de Pegasus, mas o duelo s comeou. O prximo nvel do mortal Jogo da Sombra est prestes a comear!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 3

programme.title: Yugi esmorece de cansao sob o poder do devastador Jogo da Sombra. Seus amigos gritam incentivos desesperados, mas suas vozes no conseguem penetrar a esfera de escurido. A chance de vitria de Yugi est esvaecendo, e sua vida tambm.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 4

programme.title: Pegasus invoca Renunciado, um monstro assustador que pode assimilar os Monstros de Duelo de Yugi! Yugi reage com... Kuriboh? A criatura mais fraca e menor do jogo? Yugi desistiu ou tem uma ltima estratgia para arrancar a vitria das garras da derrota?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 5

programme.title: A Saga Pegasus chega ao seu fim, mas uma nova jornada est prestes a comear! Yugi conhece um egpcio misterioso chamado Shadi, que entra na mente de Yugi com a Chave do Milnio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos retornam do Reino dos Duelistas e conhecem uma jovem chamada Rebecca, que exige que o av de Yugi lhe devolva o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis! Ela veio reivindicar a carta que o av de Yugi roubou do av dela muitos anos atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A junta de diretores desonestos da KaibaCorp prende Kaiba dentro de um jogo de realidade virtual! Mokuba recruta Yugi e Joey para libertar Kaiba desse jogo sem igual, no qual perder equivale a morrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Road Trip, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb?, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: John Candy is bigger, better and more bumbling than ever as a soft-headed private eye determined to crack a kidnapping case.

programme.title: Road Trip, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross, (1992, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A group of Chicago real-estate salesmen and con artists live on the edge.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: The Professional, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: The mysterious Leon (Jean Reno) is New York's top hitman. When his next-door neighbors are murdered, Leon becomes the unwilling guardian of the family's sole survivor - 12-year-old Mathilda (Natalie Portman). Rating:R

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Robin Williams star in a story of the consequences of a maverick doctor's medical miracle. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Shout at the Devil, (1976, War)
programme.desc: In this epic tale of adventure and revenge, Lee Marvin and Roger Moore are recruited by the WW I allied forces to take on a German battleship! An exciting mix of humor, action and the unique chemistry shared between two of Hollywood's finest stars.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaidos Army Gathers!

programme.title: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!

programme.title: The night before the great battle, Orochi orders the destruction of the Sunny along with some bridges across the country to block Akazaya samurai's allies from their rendezvous.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!

programme.title: When the angry mountain god, the giant boar, almost kills Kin'emon, Oden steps in. Kin'emon is impressed when he sees Oden's strength and pledges his life to serve him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!

programme.title: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!

programme.title: Whitebeard and his crew dock at one of the ports in the Land of Wano with their broken ship and the news excites Oden. He runs to the port and asks Whitebeard to let him get on board the ship but the request is rejected.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden's journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!

programme.title: In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin'emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!

programme.title: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!

programme.title: Enraged by Orochi's tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!

programme.title: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!

programme.title: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido's mansion. Even though Oden's group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!

programme.title: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!

programme.title: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!

programme.title: As Kin'emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden's family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!

programme.title: The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!

programme.title: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin'emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido's army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido's army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!

programme.title: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!

programme.title: To Law and the others' surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido's formidable subordinates are also called in.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaidos Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Samurai Warriors Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!

programme.title: Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido's castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido's banquet.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaidos Banquet!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido's subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thinking of Otama! Luffys Furious Strike!

programme.title: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!

programme.title: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Science fiction)

programme.title: Vingana Implacvel
programme.desc: Um agente da Interpol atribudo a uma fora-tarefa para combater o trfico de armas e drogas na regio dos Blcs. Quando um membro da fora-tarefa morto ele lidera a equipe em uma aventura cheia de ao enquanto vinga a morte de seu amigo.

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal
